replies.body: I saw this last night. It's a great video, however I wish every homeless person was like this :/ i was in London at the start of this year, and walked past someone who was sitting down on the pavement begging, and as soon as i'd walked past I did feel a bit bad for him. Then we walked back down the street a while later and he was standing in the exact same spot holding a pack of cigarettes and smoking one of them with this woman standing next to him, and i was really glad I hadn't given him anything then -.- i think they should have done this experiment on more than one person tbh, there are at least as many selfish people out there as there are good ones like this person.
replies.body_tagged: I saw this last night. It's a great video, however I wish every homeless person was like this :/ i was in London at the start of this year, and walked past someone who was sitting down on the pavement begging, and as soon as i'd walked past I did feel a bit bad for him. Then we walked back down the street a while later and he was standing in the exact same spot holding a pack of cigarettes and smoking one of them with this woman standing next to him, and i was really glad I hadn't given him anything then -.- i think they should have done this experiment on more than one person tbh, there are at least as many selfish people out there as there are good ones like this person.

replies.body: I gave some pocket change to some college students, like 89 cents (all I had :p) then this guy behind me's tryna impress us cos he's an immature little boy and he wanted our approval and he gave them 20$. We start walking, and by the time we come back they have straws in their hands and bags of cocaine or meth (I didn't look, but probs meth, cant get too much cocaine for $20) Now, who could've financed that? Ye, there are those ppl out there.

replies.body: Love what this guy did.  But I saw this homeless guy on the street and my dad and I went to chick fil a and bought him some food.  He immediately ate it.  So I never give homeless people money, I give them food.

replies.body:
If he gave up on life he'd've killed himself... but he's out there trying to make a living. He can't get a job cos he has no way to pay for a car or anything of the sort, so this is the only way he can feed himself, other than like being a prostitute or a pusher or something...
If you're telling me that it's better for him to start doing illegal things to make money than asking for goodwill from passerbys, GTFO.
